definition: straight/erect/to stick out (a part of the body)/to (physically) straighten up/to support/to withstand/outstanding/(coll.) quite/very/classifier for machine guns
to lift/to hold up/to cite/to enumerate/to act/to raise/to choose/to elect/act/move/deed

sentences.english: Dear spectators, the clean and jerk competition has concluded.
sentences.chinese: 親愛的觀衆，挺舉比賽現在結束。

sentences.english: Yeah, he broke the weightlifting world record in the clean-and-jerk in 2003.
sentences.chinese: 是啊，他零三年的時候還打破了挺舉的世界紀錄呢。

sentences.english: The battle flag in the distance jerked about madly.
sentences.chinese: 戰鬥旗在遠處挺舉關於發狂地。
